p: Spermatozoa treated with TTO showed a decreasing trend for TotM ( Figure 3A) already at 0.4 mg/mL, statistically appreciable only from 0.8 mg/mL ( p = 0.0003). The treatment with TER ( Figure 3B) did not determine significant alterations of sperm motility, with the only exception for the highest tested concentration of 0.83 mg/mL ( p = 0.05), corresponding to 2 mg/mL of TTO.
